tooltips.engineName: The name and model of the engine used in {brandModel} tractor
tooltips.hp: Horsepower - The power output of the {brandModel} engine
tooltips.powerKw: Power output of {brandModel} measured in kilowatts
tooltips.cylinders: Number of cylinders in the {brandModel} engine
tooltips.displacement: Engine displacement of {brandModel} in cubic centimeters (CC)
tooltips.engineRatedRpm: The optimal RPM at which the {brandModel} engine operates efficiently
tooltips.coolingSystem: Type of cooling system used in {brandModel} to maintain engine temperature
tooltips.specificFuelConsumption: Amount of fuel consumed per unit of power output by {brandModel}
tooltips.torque: Rotational force produced by the {brandModel} engine
tooltips.transmissionName: Type and model of the transmission system in {brandModel}
tooltips.numberOfGears: Total number of forward and reverse gears available in {brandModel}
tooltips.maximumForwardSpeed: Maximum speed the {brandModel} can achieve in forward direction
tooltips.maximumReverseSpeed: Maximum speed the {brandModel} can achieve in reverse direction
tooltips.clutchSize: Size of the clutch mechanism in {brandModel}
tooltips.clutchType: Type of clutch system used in {brandModel}
tooltips.ptoHp: Power Take-Off horsepower available for implements in {brandModel}
tooltips.ptoType: Type of Power Take-Off system in {brandModel}
tooltips.ptoSpeed: Operating speed of the Power Take-Off in {brandModel}
tooltips.brakes: Type of braking system used in {brandModel}
tooltips.steering: Type of steering system used in {brandModel}
tooltips.steeringAdjustment: Adjustability features of the steering system in {brandModel}
tooltips.turningRadius: Minimum radius required for {brandModel} to make a complete turn
tooltips.fuelTankCapacity: Maximum fuel storage capacity of {brandModel} tank
tooltips.pumpFlow: Flow rate of the hydraulic pump in {brandModel}
tooltips.wheelBase: Distance between the front and rear axles of {brandModel}
tooltips.groundClearance: Minimum distance between the ground and the lowest part of {brandModel}
tooltips.liftingCapacity: Maximum weight the hydraulic system of {brandModel} can lift
tooltips.pointLinkage: Type of linkage system for implements in {brandModel}
tooltips.hydraulicControl: Type of hydraulic control system in {brandModel}
tooltips.tyreSize: Size specifications of the tyres used in {brandModel}
tooltips.wheelDrive: Type of wheel drive system (2WD or 4WD) in {brandModel}
tooltips.warranty: Warranty period and coverage details for {brandModel}
tooltips.rpm: Revolutions per minute of the {brandModel} engine
tooltips.airFilter: Type of air filtration system in {brandModel}
tooltips.acType: Type of air conditioning system in {brandModel}
tooltips.alternator: Alternator specifications for charging system in {brandModel}
tooltips.differentialLock: Differential lock system for improved traction in {brandModel}

tyreDetail.aboutDescription: , it's easy for a farmer to move the tractor in a field and use different kinds of implements.
tyreDetail.compatibilityDescription: This tractor tyre is compatible with leading tractor models of brands like Mahindra, Sonalika, John Deere, New Holland, and many more. It comes at an affordable price and is easily available all over India. Buying this tractor tyre is a great decision for agriculture and commercial farmers. TractorGyan provides updated information related to
tyreDetail.tractionDescription: can provide traction that a tractor requires to move and operate in various types of fields like uneven fields and wet farms.
tyreDetail.heavyLoadDescription: This tractor tyre is designed to carry heavy loads without any hassle. Farmers can attach compatible implements with the tractor using this tractor tyre and use them.
tyreDetail.engineeringDescription: is prepared using modern engineering and distributes the tractor weight equally. Because of this, soil compaction is low and soil structure is maintained.
tyreDetail.shockAbsorptionDescription: This tyre absorbs the shocks from uneven ground and provides a better and more comfortable ride experience.
tyreDetail.qualityMaterialsDescription: is built with premium quality materials and can operate in rough farming conditions without any issues.
tyreDetail.farmingTasksDescription: It supports all sorts of farming tasks such as ploughing, seeding, mulching, and harvesting.
tyreDetail.priceDescription: price is affordable and fully justified, seeing the features and benefits it offers to its users. Farmers can check the updated
tyreDetail.priceDescriptionSuffix: price in India on TractorGyan. Here, you can learn about tractor tyre prices, their features, and other related information under one roof, saving time & effort.
tyreDetail.featuresDescription: This tractor tyre comes with a strong casing that makes it durable. The tread design of
tyreDetail.featuresDescriptionSuffix: is suitable for all farming and commercial-related tasks. It has a mud-shaker feature to keep the tyre clean during operation.
tyreDetail.maintenanceDescription: Farmers can increase the life of a tractor tyre if they follow the below-mentioned tractor tyre maintenance tips.
tyreDetail.maintenanceTip1: Check the tyre regularly and replace or fix it if you see any signs of cuts, damage, and punters.
tyreDetail.maintenanceTip2: The tyre must have proper pressure so that any kind of damage is avoided.
tyreDetail.maintenanceTip3: Never carry the load beyond the recommended limit. Overloading makes tyres easily damaged and increases the risk of blowouts.
tyreDetail.howTractorGyanHelps: How can TractorGyan help you buy
tyreDetail.tractorGyanDescription: TractorGyan is a leading online platform that provides information on tractors, implements, tyres, and more in India. It also helps farmers to know about updated
tyreDetail.tractorGyanDescriptionMiddle: prices, features, warranties, and specifications. This information can help you make a wise decision and get an ideal tractor tyre on an affordable budget.
